item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Metacognitive laziness: Effects of generative AI on learning motivation (21 points | 4 comments)
2. Kimi K1.5: Scaling Reinforcement Learning with LLMs (105 points | 11 comments)
3. Show HN: Printercow – Turn any thermal printer into an API endpoint (15 points | 3 comments)
4. DeepSeek-R1 (1453 points | 512 comments)
5. Reverse engineering Call of Duty anti-cheat (370 points | 120 comments)
6. Show HN: Amurex – An open source AI meeting copilot (8 points | discuss)
7. People are bad at reporting what they eat. That's a problem for dietary research (71 points | 108 comments)
8. Mixxx: GPL DJ Software (548 points | 115 comments)
9. 417-megapixel Andromeda galaxy panorama took over a decade to make (207 points | 68 comments)
10. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney, who does work for YC and startups. AMA (322 points | 337 comments)
11. The Sonnenschein-Mantel-Debreu Results After Thirty Years (10 points | discuss)
12. Ask HN: Organize local communities without Facebook? (8 points | 1 comment)
13. Fixing a uname bug (Apache NuttX RTOS) (19 points | 5 comments)
14. Startup Winter: Hacker News Lost Its Faith (327 points | 187 comments)
15. Regency Sex Ed: How did women in 19th C. Europe learn about the birds and bees? (58 points | 18 comments)
16. I am (not) a failure: Lessons learned from six failed startup attempts (439 points | 258 comments)
17. SRCL: Open-source React project to build web apps with terminal aesthetics (147 points | 19 comments)
18. Using eSIMs with devices that only have a physical SIM slot via a 9eSIM SIM car (349 points | 204 comments)
19. Celestial Navigation for Drones (190 points | 114 comments)
20. Unlink vs. DEL – A deep dive into how it works internally in Redis (10 points | 7 comments)
21. Where do those undergraduate divisibility problems come from? (139 points | 41 comments)
22. Remarks to Software Forum Dinner Meeting (1997) (4 points | discuss)
23. 'It's a nightmare': couriers mystified by the algorithms that control their jobs (6 points | 1 comment)
24. Guitar chord karaoke with Vamp, Chordino, and FFmpeg (2022) (108 points | 30 comments)
25. Show HN: Personalized Duolingo (kind of) for vocabulary building (134 points | 35 comments)
26. Zork: The Great Inner Workings (2020) (183 points | 62 comments)
27. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (175 points | 130 comments)
28. Kronotop: Redis-compatible, transactional document store backed by FoundationDB (66 points | 16 comments)
29. Context should go away for Go 2 (2017) (76 points | 86 comments)
30. An astronomical view of Ancient Egyptian star clocks (2021) (33 points | 11 comments)
